column2: DEBUG NOTIFICATION:\n[FromFrom.GetBestName] informs me that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] has chosen to join a society, due to the "AutoJoin" feature of the "Expanded Decisions: Society Joining" mod. This notification is only generated if the global flag "expd_sj_debug_autojoin" has been set - to disable this notification, clear the flag via the console.
